name: 외교부 OPEN DATA
description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs Open Data, providing categorized, frequency-based data including declassified diplomatic documents (currently up to 1993), materials published by the Institute of Foreign Affairs and National Security (until 2024), diplomatic records from the 2023 diplomatic chronology ('24 pilot build), and briefing/press release analysis (until 2025, linked to MOFA Insights).
owner_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Republic of Korea
